metadata.title: CVE-2022-0566 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: It may be possible for an attacker to craft an email message that causesThunderbird to perform an out-of-bounds write of one byte when processingthe message. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 91.6.1.

criterions.comment: thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
